title: Greek Chicken Souvlaki (Variation 1)
method: Combine olive oil, garlic, lemon juice, oregano, salt and pepper in a bowl.
Add chicken and marinate for at least 30 minutes.
Thread chicken onto skewers.
Grill or bake at 200°C for 20–25 minutes until cooked through, turning halfway.
swaps: Swap chicken for halloumi for a vegetarian version.
hydrationTip: Serve with water infused with lemon for extra refreshment.

title: Scottish Stovies (Variation 1)
method: Melt dripping in a large pan and soften onions.
Layer meat, potatoes, and onions in the pan.
Pour in beef stock to just cover.
Simmer gently for 45 minutes until potatoes are tender.
swaps: Use vegetable stock and root veg instead of meat for a vegan version.
hydrationTip: Pair with a glass of water to balance the saltiness.
